en.name: Order Line Detail Total Quantity Metrics
en.description: Order Line Detail Inbound Total Quantity Metrics

devConfigurations.name: queries[0].fields
values: query TotalQuantityMetrics($tenantId: String, $orderLineId: String) { totalQuantityNotShipped: businessObjects(hint: {viewId: "graph" }, simpleFilter: { tenantId: $tenantId, type: OrderLine }, advancedFilter: {AND: [ { EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "id", type: STRING }, { VALUE: $orderLineId, type: STRING } ] }, {EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "order.orderType", type: STRING }, {VALUE: "INBOUND", type: STRING } ] }, { EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "shipmentLines.shipment.statusByDate", type: STRING}, {VALUE: "NOT_SHIPPED", type: STRING } ] } ] }, aggregationParams: { dimension: { fieldPath: "id", type: STRING }, reduce: { expression: {operator: SUM, fieldPath: "quantity", type: FLOAT}, output: { resultAlias: "totalQuantityNotShipped", type: INT } } } ) { aggregationResults { values { name numValue } } } totalQuantityInTransit: businessObjects(hint: {viewId: "graph" }, simpleFilter: { tenantId: $tenantId, type: OrderLine }, advancedFilter: {AND: [ {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "id", type: STRING }, {VALUE: $orderLineId, type: STRING } ] },{ EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "order.orderType", type: STRING }, { VALUE: "INBOUND", type: STRING } ] }, { EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "shipmentLines.shipment.statusByDate", type: STRING}, { VALUE: "IN_TRANSIT", type: STRING } ] } ] }, aggregationParams: { dimension: {fieldPath: "id", type: STRING}, reduce: {expression: {operator: SUM, fieldPath: "quantity", type: FLOAT}, output: {resultAlias: "totalQuantityInTransit", type: INT } } } ) { aggregationResults { values { name numValue } } } totalQuantityDelivered: businessObjects(hint: {viewId: "graph"}, simpleFilter: {tenantId: $tenantId, type: OrderLine}, advancedFilter: {AND: [ { EQUALS: [{SELECT: "id", type: STRING}, {VALUE: $orderLineId, type: STRING}]}, { EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "order.orderType", type: STRING }, { VALUE: "INBOUND", type: STRING}]}, { EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "shipmentLines.shipment.statusByDate", type: STRING }, { VALUE: "DELIVERED", type: STRING } ] } ] }, aggregationParams: { dimension: { fieldPath: "id", type: STRING }, reduce: { expression: { operator: SUM, fieldPath: "quantity", type: FLOAT}, output: { resultAlias: "totalQuantityDelivered", type: INT } } } ) { aggregationResults { values { name numValue } } } }
